resources.string: Please give a valid URL for your public wishlist
Looks like the provided URL not supported
Are you sure you want to delete?
Are you sure you want to clear the list?
There are active queries at the moment. Are you sure you want to cancel them?
Information about adding new books via URL

1, Login to the page
2, Open your wishlist
3, Create a new list 
4, Switch back to wishlist 
5, Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://bookline.hu/productshelf/productshelfMain.action?ename=02342650C115313FB2997AA3F9FB4752&listName=_&page=1

1, Open the page
2, Search for the book
Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://bookline.hu/product/home.action?type=22&_v=David_Guymer_Dorn_utolso_fia&id=309244

Additional notes: 
Some books don't have ISBN code on the page. You can't add those.

1, Login to the page
2, Open your wishlist
3, Click on 'Publikus lista megtekintése'
4, Create a public wishlist
5, Copy the URL of the public wishlist

Example: 
https://www.libri.hu/kivansaglista/?c121e9cefab6e067b93b6d6ed8489521

1, Open the page
2, Search for the book
Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://www.libri.hu/konyv/dan_abnett.ravenor-visszater.html

1, Login to the page
2, Open your wishlist
3, Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://moly.hu/tagok/cytog3n/kivansaglista

Additional note: You don't have to login, you can use the https://moly.hu/tagok/{username}/kivansaglista link with your username.

1, Open the page
2, Search for the book
Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://moly.hu/konyvek/dan-abnett-en-vagyok-a-meszaros 

Additional notes:
There are books with multiples ISBN numbers. The application will add the book with the FIRST isbn.

1, Login to the page
2, Open your wishlist
3, Click on 'Lista megosztása'
4, Fill the informations, and send the email into your adress
5, Copy the URL from the bottom of the email

Example: 
https://21.szazadkiado.hu/index.php?route=wishlist/wishlist&listid=98b097d00037bca061d75bab5fb46556

1, Open the page
2, Search for the book
Copy the page URL

Example: 
https://21.szazadkiado.hu/az-uj-munkatars-michelle-frances 

Additional notes: 
You may have to edit the title, because the page don't have title field, just [Title - Author/Additional comment].

1, Export your wishlist as an Excel file 
2, Browse the exported file for the application 
3, Click on import 

Additional notes: 
Importing with this, will NOT merge with your previous list. This will create a new list based on the Excel file.
Wrong implementation. Please check the logs.
